metadata.synopsis: If Lae'zel or GITH avatar is present they react toentering deeper into the hatchery. If they aren't present, some other party character reacts with generic comment.
metadata.how_to_trigger: load up CRE_Main_Ago to 1293; 1; -772the AD will play

0.text: Gods, it smells awful in here.
